name: Multiple Use Demo
description: This is only some of the game I had ideated at the beginning of my semester. Please go to multipleuse.cargo.site to see how this came about! I want to continue working on this since there's so much I couldn't add because of time constraints. I learned a lot doing this though, which I'm so thankful for. Acknowledgments, credits, and more information are all available on the aforementioned project page.
